page.title: 06LOCAL ISSUES.
page.content: These mainly take the form of coastal defence, or coastal development. There has been a twenty year saga a Beesands involving the presence of a large caravan site on the proposed site of the village green. A large number of local residents in the area wish to see the land put to use as a money obtaining area (the caravan park) while the rest would rather it be put to use as a village green. An argument for the caravan site is to create employment for the younger unemployed local residents who would otherwise have to travel further afield to gain employment. The main argument for the village green is that it will enhance the visual aspect of the village therefore attracting many more day trippers who tend to spend more than the residents and caravaners.
